String.Source: Grelod was trying to teach you discipline. Now look at you.
String.Dest: 桂罗是在教你规矩。看看你自己。

String.Source: Because small children annoy me and I like to beat them senseless.
String.Dest: 因为小孩让我火大而且我喜欢毫无理由地揍他们一顿。

String.Source: Frostbite will slow your enemies and allow you to escape.
String.Dest: 霜噬术能减速你的对手让你有时间逃跑。

String.Source: This Clairvoyance Spell provides an extra sense to help guide you to safety.
String.Dest: 洞察术会带你到安全的地方。

String.Source: Where are your parents?
String.Dest: 你的父母呢？

String.Source: Where are your parents?
String.Dest: 你的父母呢？

String.Source: Because little girls can test a nice person's patience and make them angry.
String.Dest: 因为一个小女孩能考验一位绅士的耐心或者让他愤怒。

String.Source: Sorry, I don't have any tomes that can help you.
String.Dest: 抱歉，我帮不了你。

String.Source: Sorry, I don't have any tomes that can help you.
String.Dest: 抱歉，我帮不了你。

String.Source: Goodbye for now. Be strong girl. It will all be over soon.
String.Dest: 再见。做个坚强的女孩，事情很快就会过去的.

String.Source: Tell me how Griffith fought off the monsters.
String.Dest: 告诉我格里菲斯是如何击退怪物的。

String.Source: Tell me how Griffith fought off the monsters.
String.Dest: 告诉我格里菲斯是如何击退怪物的。

String.Dest: 告诉我格里菲斯是如何击退怪物的。

String.Dest: 告诉我格里菲斯是如何击退怪物的。

String.Source: Tell me how Griffith fought off the monsters.
String.Dest: 告诉我格里菲斯是如何击退怪物的。

String.Source: Oh, I'm not falling for this again.
String.Dest: 哦，我不会再犯这种错了。

String.Source: You called Griffith your Pa earlier.
String.Dest: 你之前叫格里菲斯爸爸.

String.Source: Well, you won't ever have to worry about Grelod again.
String.Dest: 好了，你再也不用担心桂罗了。

String.Source: Tell me about Griffith.
String.Dest: 跟我谈谈格里菲斯吧。

String.Source: Tell me about Griffith.
String.Dest: 跟我谈谈格里菲斯吧。

String.Dest: 跟我谈谈格里菲斯吧。

String.Dest: 跟我谈谈格里菲斯吧。

String.Dest: 跟我谈谈格里菲斯吧。

String.Source: Tell me about Griffith.
String.Dest: 跟我谈谈格里菲斯吧。

String.Source: Actually, there's no taffy.
String.Dest: 其实，我没有奶糖。

String.Source: A ward can provide just as much protection as a shield.
String.Dest: 一道结界可以像一面盾牌一样保护你。

String.Source: Just three? I took out six while you were finishing that sentence.
String.Dest: 就三个？在你说这句话的时候我就已经干掉了六个。

String.Source: Just three? I took out six while you were finishing that sentence.
String.Dest: 就三个？在你说这句话的时候我就已经干掉了六个。

String.Source: Just three? I took out six while you were finishing that sentence.
String.Dest: 就三个？在你说这句话的时候我就已经干掉了六个。

String.Source: What are you two doing here?
String.Dest: 你们两个在这里干嘛？

String.Source: Griffith is a smart man.
String.Dest: 格里菲斯是个聪明人。

String.Source: Griffith lied. Strangers often have taffy and other fine treats.
String.Dest: 格里菲斯撒谎，陌生人常常会有奶糖之类的小零食。

String.Source: Well then, we better get to know each other before Griffith ruins our fun.
String.Dest: 好吧。那我们最好在格里菲斯来扫兴之前互相认识。

String.Source: Come child, and I will teach you how to conjure a Dremora Lord.
String.Dest: 来吧孩子，我会教你如何召唤一个魔人领主。

String.Source: Here. Have some taffy and keep quiet.
String.Dest: 给，吃点奶糖然后安静待着。

String.Source: Here. Have some taffy and keep quiet.
String.Dest: 给，吃点奶糖然后安静待着。

String.Source: But we're already talking. That means I'm not a stranger.
String.Dest: 可咱们已经在说话啦。也就是说现在我不是陌生人啦。

String.Source: You don't have to fight bad men. A Familiar can do it for you.
String.Dest: 你不需要跟坏人战斗。灵狼可以为你效劳。

String.Source: Candlelight can blind a pursuer temporarily.
String.Dest: 烛光能让一个追捕者暂时失明。

String.Source: Why indeed. It is a question mortals have wrestled with since the dawn of time.
String.Dest: 是啊，为什么？这个问题自从创世之初就一直困扰着人类。

String.Source: Three, huh?
String.Dest: 三个,嗯？

String.Source: I am strong. Someday I'll be as strong as Griffith! Then we'll fight monsters together!
String.Dest: 我很强。将来我会和格里菲斯一样强！那时我们就可以一起对付怪物了！

String.Source: Don't I know it. I almost got frostbite on my toes once. I couldn't move and they hurt real bad.
String.Dest: 我知道啊，我曾经得过一次冻疮，那痛苦让我寸步难行。

String.Source: I don't like him.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢他。

String.Source: He's the nicest, bravest man I've ever met! One time, he saved me from three monsters!
String.Dest: 他是我见过最优秀、最勇敢的男人！他曾经从三个怪物的口中把我救了回来！

String.Source: Taffy! Oh goodie! You're the best! I mean...you're the best.
String.Dest: 奶糖!哦太好了!你太棒了!我是说……你是最棒的。

String.Source: Is it like a pet? I've always wanted a dog, but I don't think Griffith would let me.
String.Dest: 那是宠物一类的吗？我一直想要一条狗，但我认为格里菲斯不会让我养的。

String.Source: Wow, an extra sense! This is going to really help with the cooking. I heard someone around here say you needed an extra one.
String.Dest: 哇哦，额外增加的感官！这对厨艺绝对大有帮助啊！我在附近听人说要下厨就需要额外的感官。

String.Source: Yeah! They didn't stand a chance!
String.Dest: 是啊！他们根本没机会！

String.Source: I don't have parents. Francois at the orphanage said everyone has parents, but I'm not so sure.
String.Dest: 我没有爸妈。在孤儿院弗朗克司说每个人都有爸妈，但我不敢肯定。

String.Source: I wanna grow up to be just like Griffith!
String.Dest: 我长大后想像格里菲斯一样！

String.Source: Well, I used the potion, but the monster kept coming, so I used the spell your friend gave me, and ran away screaming!
String.Dest: 是啊，我用了那个药水，但怪物却一直往我这来。所以我用了你朋友给我的那个咒语，然后就尖叫着逃跑了！

String.Source: Rrr...Griffith was right!
String.Dest: 呃……格里菲斯是对的!

String.Source: Griffith and I are playing hide and seek.
String.Dest: 格里菲斯和我在玩儿捉迷藏。

String.Source: I kept screaming until a hand closed my mouth shut. I was so scared. I thought the monsters got me.
String.Dest: 我当时不停的尖叫，突然一只手捂住了我的嘴。我吓坏了。我以为被那些怪物抓住了。

String.Source: I never thought of using it that way! You're really smart!
String.Dest: 我从没想过还可以这么做！你真聪明！

String.Source: I once found an old shield and used it as a sled. Maybe I can do the same with a ward!
String.Dest: 有次我拿一面旧盾牌当过雪橇用。说不定用结界也可以！

String.Source: Why?
String.Dest: 为什么？

String.Source: Why?
String.Dest: 为什么？

String.Source: Why?
String.Dest: 为什么？

String.Source: Or maybe they're just really tiny. Monsters are like that.
String.Dest: 也许是因为他们很小。怪物就是这样。

String.Source: I like magic. Maybe I'll enroll at the College of Winterhold.
String.Dest: 我喜欢魔法。也许我会被冬堡学院录取。

String.Source: It's the monster who hurt him. Griffith only kills monsters.
String.Dest: 弄伤他的是那些怪物。格里菲斯只杀怪物。

String.Source: Alright. I'll do my best.
String.Dest: 好吧，我尽力。

String.Source: No!!!
I never met them, anyway. But Grelod the Kind once called me a worthless little Breton. So...I guess they were Bretons.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，我从没见过他们。但慈祥桂罗曾经叫我“屁用没有的小布莱顿人”。所以……我猜他们也是布莱顿人。

String.Source: Really? I love taffy!
String.Dest: 真的吗？我爱吃奶糖！

String.Source: Well, we were heading towards Windhelm when it was getting dark. We made a camp and prepared for bed. I got up to go to the bathroom.
String.Dest: 嗯，天快黑时我们正朝着风盔城去。我们扎了营准备睡觉，我当时起来准备上个厕所。

String.Source: Don't worry, Pa. I'll be okay. You go get the bad monster!
String.Dest: 别担心，爸爸。我不会有事的。你去搞定那坏蛋怪物吧！

String.Source: I think so too.
String.Dest: 我也这么觉得。

String.Source: Oh, that's okay. I'll just turn invisible! Then no one can find me!
String.Dest: 噢，好吧。那我就变隐形吧！这样就没人能找到我啦！

String.Source: I was really scared. I thought I was going to die. Then a Draugr came down the steps and killed the monster! It was amazing!
String.Dest: 我吓坏了。以为我死定了。结果一只尸鬼走下台阶把那只怪物给杀了！太不可思议了。

String.Source: Griffith! One of the monsters came!
String.Dest: 格里菲斯！有一个怪物来了！

String.Source: He is! He's like a father and an uncle and a grandda rolled into one!
String.Dest: 没错！他就像是爸爸跟叔叔跟爷爷合为一体！

String.Source: I wanna speak to a dragon. Griffith says they don't talk but...I don't know.
String.Dest: 我想和龙说话。格里菲斯说他们不会讲话但是……我不确定。

String.Source: Okay, this isn't fun anymore.
String.Dest: 好吧，这就一点也不好玩了。

String.Source: He's not a killer! He's my father!
String.Dest: 他不是杀手！他是我爸爸！

String.Source: Hide and when I get the chance, sneak out the trap door.
String.Dest: 藏好然后我一有机会，就悄悄穿过那个暗门。

String.Source: Okay! I'm Morrigan.
String.Dest: 好吧！我叫茉莉甘。

String.Source: Have you seen a tall man dressed in black? I can't seem to find him anywhere. He wouldn't just leave.
String.Dest: 你有见过一个穿着黑衣的高个子男人么？我怎么也找不到他。他不可能离开的啊。

String.Source: Really? Wait...Griffith says people make that face when they lie.
String.Dest: 真的吗？等等……格里菲斯告诉我人们在说谎的时候会露出那种表情。

String.Source: Oh, I'm not falling for that again.
String.Dest: 噢，我可不要再上当了。

String.Source: Oh, that's okay. The mean Elf will protect me. Griffith said so!
String.Dest: 哦，那好吧。也就是说精灵会保护我。格里菲斯是这么说的！

String.Source: Thanks for helping my Pa. You're the best!
String.Dest: 谢谢你帮助了我爸爸。你是最棒的！

String.Source: I like horses. I'd like to ride one when I get a little older.
String.Dest: 我喜欢马。等我长大一点我想试试骑马。

String.Source: Really? Are you sure they were monsters? I didn't see any come in.
String.Dest: 真的吗？你确定他们是怪物么？我没看见任何怪物闯进来。

String.Source: Griffith says I am smart and that I could do anything I wanted...Though, I guess he never considered I can't fly.
String.Dest: 格里菲斯说我很聪明，我能做任何我想要的事……虽然，我猜他从未考虑过我不能飞。

String.Source: That's when the monsters came for me. They're sneaky monsters and like to come out of the dark.
String.Dest: 那是怪物朝我过来的时候。他们悄无声息，仿佛从阴影中现身一样。

String.Source: I guess that makes sense.
String.Dest: 我觉得有点道理。

String.Source: I know sometimes Griffith looks over his shoulder, but I never see anything, except that one time.
String.Dest: 我知道，有时格里菲斯会警惕背后，但我从来没有看到过什么，除了那一次。

String.Source: Stop it! Stop fighting! You promised you would only kill the monsters! Like Gabah-nia!
String.Dest: 停！别打了！你保证过你只杀怪物的！就像卡吧…呢哑一样！

String.Source: Thank Mara! She was such a horrible old bean.
String.Dest: 玛拉保佑！她真是个可怕的老女人。

String.Source: But then I heard a whisper. And I knew I was safe because monsters can't talk. I opened my eyes, and it was Griffith.
String.Dest: 但是随后我听到了有人在对我小声说些什么。我知道我安全了因为怪物不会说话。我睁开眼睛，发现是格里菲斯。

String.Source: So when I saw them I closed my eyes and screamed as loud as I could.
String.Dest: 所以看见他们的时候我就闭上眼睛然后放声尖叫。

String.Source: I'm fine. Uncle Raynes was mean to the monster, but I think he's really just shy.
String.Dest: 我很好。瑞纳斯叔叔对怪物很凶，但我认为他只是害羞罢了。

String.Source: But I can't look at me. Not without a mirror.
String.Dest: 但是我看不见自己啊。没有镜子就看不见。

String.Source: Tell him! Tell him my pa's not a killer!
String.Dest: 快告诉他！告诉他我爸不是杀手！

String.Source: Because it's fun.
String.Dest: 因为这很有趣。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Is there anything else you can tell me about Griffith?
String.Dest: 关于格里菲斯，你还能告诉我些什么？

String.Source: Is there anything else you can tell me about Griffith?
String.Dest: 关于格里菲斯，你还能告诉我些什么？

String.Source: Is there anything else you can tell me about Griffith?
String.Dest: 关于格里菲斯，你还能告诉我些什么？

String.Source: Is there anything else you can tell me about Griffith?
String.Dest: 关于格里菲斯，你还能告诉我些什么？

String.Source: Too late. That's what happens when you don't trust strangers.
String.Dest: 太迟了，如果你不相信陌生人的话那就会这样。

String.Source: Monsters?
String.Dest: 怪物？

String.Source: Monsters?
String.Dest: 怪物？

String.Source: Now I'm sorry I killed the old woman.
String.Dest: 现在我很抱歉我杀了那个老女人。

String.Source: I remember Griffith saying you have some talent with magic.
String.Dest: 我记得格里菲斯说过你在魔法方面有天赋。

String.Source: You two are terrible at this. I can't even tell who's hiding and who's seeking.
String.Dest: 你们俩真的不擅长这个。我甚至都不知道谁在躲谁在捉。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Bretons are indeed worthless. I should know, I am one.
String.Dest: 布莱顿人确实都是废柴。我当然知道，因为我就是个废柴！

String.Source: People can fall victim to desire, greed, anger, and other unhealthy emotions.
String.Dest: 人们也会被欲望、贪婪、愤怒、和其他不健康的情绪所伤害。

String.Source: That's a factual statement. Bretons are indeed worthless.
String.Dest: 说的很对。布莱顿人确实废柴。

String.Source: Tell me about life in the Orphanage.
String.Dest: 给我说说在孤儿院的生活。

String.Source: Tell me about life in the Orphanage.
String.Dest: 给我说说在孤儿院的生活。

String.Source: Tell me about life in the Orphanage.
String.Dest: 给我说说在孤儿院的生活。

String.Source: Tell me about life in the Orphanage.
String.Dest: 给我说说在孤儿院的生活。

String.Source: Tell me about life in the Orphanage.
String.Dest: 给我说说在孤儿院的生活。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Did you get along with the other children?
String.Dest: 你跟其他孩子相处得来吗？

String.Source: Did you get along with the other children?
String.Dest: 你跟其他孩子相处得来吗？

String.Source: Did you get along with the other children?
String.Dest: 你跟其他孩子相处得来吗？

String.Source: Did you get along with the other children?
String.Dest: 你跟其他孩子相处得来吗？

String.Source: I'm a monster. I do monstrous things. Routinely.
String.Dest: 通常来说，我是个怪物，我做可怕的事。

String.Source: Because, uh, it's invigorating and...wait, hold on.
String.Dest: 因为，呃，它如此生机勃勃，并且……等等，稍等片刻。

String.Source: I love hide and seek! Can I play?
String.Dest: 我就喜欢捉迷藏！我能一起玩吗？

String.Source: That's a horrible thing to say to a child!
String.Dest: 对孩子说这种话真是要命！

String.Source: Sometimes child, the real monsters are people like you and me.
String.Dest: 孩子，有时候真正的怪物会是像你我一样的人类。

String.Source: You are definitely worthless, but too fat to be considered little.
String.Dest: 你确实是个废物，但对于“小”这个字来说你又太胖了。

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your time there?
String.Dest: 关于那段时光你有留下美好的回忆吗？

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your time there?
String.Dest: 关于那段时光你有留下美好的回忆吗？

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your time there?
String.Dest: 关于那段时光你有留下美好的回忆吗？

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your time there?
String.Dest: 关于那段时光你有留下美好的回忆吗？

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your time there?
String.Dest: 关于那段时光你有留下美好的回忆吗？

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your time there?
String.Dest: 关于那段时光你有留下美好的回忆吗？

String.Source: Although she usually got mad anyway. One time, I had my fork on the wrong side of my plate, and she stuck it into my hand.
String.Dest: 尽管她经常还是会生气。有一次，我把叉子放错了地方，她把它叉到我的手上。

String.Source: I didn't know what was going on. Samuel told me to cover my ears. Then Constance came in and huddled us into a circle.
String.Dest: 我不知道当时发生了什么。萨穆埃尔告诉我捂住耳朵，然后康斯坦斯进来让我们挤作一团。

String.Source: He also doesn't like to talk much. I only ever see him talk to me or the inn keepers, and even then he doesn't say much.
String.Dest: 他也不喜欢多说话，只和我或者旅馆老板说过话，即使开口也就只讲几句话。

String.Source: Griffith told me not to talk to strangers.
String.Dest: 格里菲斯告诉过我，不要跟陌生人说话。

String.Source: Samuel and Aventus were nice though. They took the blame whenever Grelod wanted to give me the belt.
String.Dest: 不过萨穆埃尔和阿文图斯都很好。每次桂罗要拿皮带抽我都是他们帮我挡了下来。

String.Source: Yeah! Go talk to him. I bet you two would make great friends!
String.Dest: 是啊！去跟他聊聊。我打赌你俩会成为好朋友的！

String.Source: Oh, so if I wear one, will you marry me?
String.Dest: 哦，如果我戴上它，你会跟我结婚吗？

String.Source: But I want to play with someone new. The monsters play too rough.
String.Dest: 但我想和其他人玩。这些怪物玩的时候太粗暴了。

String.Source: She said we shouldn't be scared. She told us Hroar was going to be fine. I liked her. She was so nice.
String.Dest: 她告诉我们别害怕。她告诉我们赫洛阿会没事的。我喜欢她。她是那么亲切。

String.Source: Francois always bragged how his mommy and daddy were coming for him. So I didn't like him either.
String.Dest: 弗朗克司总是夸耀他的父母会来接他。所以我也不喜欢他。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: At ten o'clock, she let us out into the yard to play tag and chase bugs, but if she caught us bringing one in, she'd give us the belt.
String.Dest: 十点的时候，她让我们到院子玩捉迷藏或抓虫子，但是我们如果把虫子带进屋子，她就会揍我们。

String.Source: You're mean! I don't like you!
String.Dest: 你太坏了！我不喜欢你！

String.Source: Griffith, what does it mean when people wear Amulets of Mara?
String.Dest: 格里菲斯，当人们佩戴着玛拉的护符时意味着什么？

String.Source: Why?
String.Dest: 为什么？

String.Source: Why?
String.Dest: 为什么？

String.Source: Why?
String.Dest: 为什么？

String.Source: Why?
String.Dest: 为什么？

String.Source: Why?
String.Dest: 为什么？

String.Source: And Constance would tuck us in and slip us snacks when Grelod wasn't looking. I don't know why they call Grelod the kind one.
String.Dest: 康斯坦斯会趁桂罗不注意的时候把我们拉过去然后塞给我们小零食吃。我不知道他们为什么会把桂罗说成慈祥的那个。

String.Source: I'll be fine. Don't worry.
String.Dest: 我会没事的。别担心。

String.Source: Is that like when people say something is worth so much, you can't put a price on it?
String.Dest: 就像是人们说一个东西特别值钱，值钱到开不出价那样吗？

String.Source: Yeah, I'm going to be a mage someday! I just don't have a book to learn any spells.
String.Dest: 是啊，假以时日我一定能成为一名法师！我只是没有能学咒语的书而已。

String.Source: Not really. Grelod was so mean. One night Hroar was crying so loud that she took him to that room that's always locked.
String.Dest: 完全没有。桂罗很坏。一天晚上因为赫洛阿的哭声大，所以她就带他去了那个一直被锁起来的房间。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: It hurt a whole bunch, but later Constance kissed it and told me to be strong.
String.Dest: 手背好痛，但过了一会康斯坦斯亲吻了伤口并告诉我坚强起来

String.Source: Oh. Will you at least come to my wedding?
String.Dest: 哦。至少你能来参加我的婚礼吗？

String.Source: Well I know he doesn't sleep much. I think he has bad dreams or something.
String.Dest: 好吧，我知道他不怎么睡觉。我猜他可能是会做噩梦之类的。

String.Source: She sang pretty loud too, loud enough you could hear it outside, but I didn't mind.
String.Dest: 她唱得很大声，声音大到你足以在门外听见，但我不介意。

String.Source: Oh, we're both hiding. The monsters are seeking. You're not a monster, are you?
String.Dest: 哦，我们都在躲躲藏藏呢。那怪物在找我们。你不是怪物吧？？

String.Source: Bye.
String.Dest: 拜拜。

String.Source: Hroar was named after a lion, but he cried more than he roared. I didn't like Runa. Not after she squished the torchbug I caught in the yard.
String.Dest: 赫罗阿的名字源自狮子，只可惜他哭鼻子比狮子吼得还响。在卢娜踩扁了我在院子里抓的萤火虫之后，我就觉得他们两个一样讨厌。

String.Source: Then she sang to us. She sang all my favorite nursery songs.
String.Dest: 然后她对我们唱歌了。她唱我们所有人喜爱的儿歌。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: You don't have any taffy, do you?
String.Dest: 其实你没有奶糖，对吧？

String.Source: It wasn't fun. We had to wake up really early in the morning so Grelod would have someone to yell at other than Constance.
String.Dest: 这可不有趣。我们必须早早醒来，这样除了康斯坦斯，桂罗也能责骂其他人了。

String.Source: Yeah...I was so happy when Griffith came for me. I didn't like it there...None of us did.
String.Dest: 是啊……格里菲斯来找我时我是那么开心。我讨厌那里……那里没人喜欢。

String.Source: Griffith, what's the meaning of life?
String.Dest: 格里菲斯，生命的意义是什么？

String.Source: So you don't like yourself? Aww...how sad.
String.Dest: 所以你不喜欢你自己？啊……这可真悲伤。

String.Source: I think he might be a little shy. Hey, why don't you try talking to him. You're really nice, so he might like talking to you.
String.Dest: 我想他大概有一点点害羞。嘿，为什么你不跟他聊聊天呢。你看上去挺不错的，他应该会很乐意与你聊天。

String.Source: Yeah, they wear all black and red because their skin is creepy and gross. Griffith says they're playing hide and seek with us.
String.Dest: 是啊，他们都穿着红黑相间的衣服是因为他们的皮肤又可怕又恶心。格里菲斯说他们在跟我们一起玩儿捉迷藏。

String.Source: Although I don't think she liked her singing all that much, because when she finished, it looked like she was crying.
String.Dest: 虽然我不认为她喜欢自己唱的歌。因为她唱完的时候，看起来像是在哭。

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: Sure! But not until this game's finished. Right now we're still hiding. The black and red monsters are seeking.
String.Dest: 当然！不过等这个小游戏结束再说吧。我们现在还得藏得好好的。红黑色的怪物正在找我们呢。

String.Source: My favorite time was the afternoon. That's when we got to eat. Constance made sure we learned our table manners so Grelod wouldn't get mad.
String.Dest: 我最喜欢时刻是下午吃饭的时间。康斯坦斯会保证我们有很好的餐桌礼仪，这样桂罗就不会生气。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他被迫在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: You killed Grelod? Did Aventus help?
String.Dest: 你杀死了桂罗？阿文图斯帮上忙了吗？
